entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
